StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_DBAMigrateSchools]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
as
declare @school_code int, @mcc varchar(5), @organiza.on_id int, @state varchar(2), @name varchar(40), @phone varchar(10), @street varchar(40), @city varchar(20), @zip varchar(9), @user varchar(15), @update_date date.me, @deleted char(1), @dod_code varchar(20), @school_type char(2)
declare migra.on cursor for
select MCC_CODE,SCHOOL_NAME,DOD_CODE,PHONE,STREET,CITY,STATE,ZIP from arms..HIGH_MIGRATION
open migra.on
fetch migra.on into @mcc,@name,@dod_code, @phone, @street, @city, @state, @zip
set @user = 'migra.on' set @update_date = getdate() set @deleted = 'N'
while (@@fetch_status = 0) begin
set @organiza.on_id = (select organiza.on_id from recrui.ng_organiza.on where MCC_CODE = @mcc) if substring(@dod_code,1,2) = 'CC' set @school_type = 'CC' else set @school_type = 'HS'
if @organiza.on_id is not null begin
if not exists (select 1 from HIGH_SCHOOL where DOD_CODE = @dod_code) begin insert into HIGH_SCHOOL (ORGANIZATION_ID,STATE_CODE,HIGHSCHOOL_NAME,TELEPHONE_NUMBER,STREET, CITY,ZIP_CODE,DELETED,DOD_CODE,SCHOOL_TYPE,USER_LOGIN,UPDATE_DATE) values (@organiza.on_id, @state, @name, @phone, @street, @city, @zip, @deleted, @dod_code, @school_type, @user, @update_date)
print 'HIGH_SCHOOL INSERTED'
end else begin update HIGH_SCHOOL set ORGANIZATION_ID = @organiza.on_id, STATE_CODE = @state, HIGHSCHOOL_NAME = @name, TELEPHONE_NUMBER = @phone, STREET = @street, CITY = @city, ZIP_CODE = @zip, DELETED = @deleted, DOD_CODE = @dod_code, SCHOOL_TYPE = @school_type, USER_LOGIN = @user, UPDATE_DATE = @update_date where DOD_CODE = @dod_code
print 'HIGH_SCHOOL UPDATED' end end else print @mcc + ''+ 'Is not a valid MCC_CODE'
fetch migra.on into @mcc,@name,@dod_code, @phone, @street, @city, @state, @zip
end
close migra.on deallocate migra.on
